title: Operation Stormbreak
briefing: Enemy mortar platforms have seized the breakwater beyond our carrier. Launch from the deck, silence every battery, and hold the coastal bunkers long enough for the convoy to escape.
introDialog: Ops: Mortar barges have the breakwater locked down and our convoys pinned.
XO: Knock out the platforms and keep those strike boats from slipping through.
Pilot: Deck is clear. Rolling in fast.

objectives.name: Shut down the eastern mortar nest

successDialog: Ops: Breakwater is ours. Strike boats are wreckage and the convoy is moving.
